The data shows forward looking budget data reported to the International Aid Transparency Initiative (IATI) by the UK for existing or committed projects spanning multiple years. Budget data is displayed for the Department for International Development only. This visualisation shows only project financing for specific countries: Regional and unspecified funding is excluded
